Article.ArticleTitle: Keeping People Enrolled During Medicaid Expansion and COVID-19 Continuous Coverage Unwinding.

Abstract.AbstractText: North Carolina is expanding Medicaid insurance coverage while simultaneously removing coverage from individuals as a result of the end of the COVID-19 emergency. These large-scale eligibility changes have created an opportunity for improved processes. North Carolina chose to build upon the existing Medicaid Family Planning program to maintain access to health care while launching Medicaid expansion.
